Sentencas: As one of the key technologies in the development of a direct internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell, catalytic activity and stability of a Ni-YSZ-CeO2 anode on a zirconia electrolyte for the steam reforming of methane was investigated by experiments using a differential fuel cell reactor.
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ-CeO2 anode for the steam reforming of methane in a direct internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The effects of the partial pressure of CH4, H2O and H-2, and temperature as well as the electrochemical oxidation on the catalytic activity were analyzed.
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ-CeO2 anode for the steam reforming of methane in a direct internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It was found that the catalytic activity of the Ni-YSZ-CeO2 anode was higher than that of the Ni-YSZ reported especially at low temperature.
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ-CeO2 anode for the steam reforming of methane in a direct internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A deterioration of the catalytic activity of the anode was observed at low P-H2 and high P-H2O atmosphere, and also at high current densities.
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ-CeO2 anode for the steam reforming of methane in a direct internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This might be caused by the oxidation of the Ni surface by H2O in the reaction gas and that produced by the anodic reaction.
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ-CeO2 anode for the steam reforming of methane in a direct internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A rate equation for a fractional function for the steam reforming on open circuit was also proposed.
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ-CeO2 anode for the steam reforming of methane in a direct internal-reforming solid oxide fuel cell
